reporting.reporttable.TableQuery:
DECLARE @globalCurrency bit; SET @globalCurrency = {%Settings.CMSStoreUseGlobalCurrencies?1:0|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)648dd2e719b7144c5ad66707129ac95fc087385056ab96132972b948daa4ea07%};
DECLARE @totalsum float; SET @totalsum = (SELECT SUM(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency) FROM COM_Currency LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON CurrencyID = OrderCurrencyID AND (OrderDate >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (OrderDate <= DATEADD(day,1,@ToDate) OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND (ISNULL(@OnlyPaid,0) = 0 OR ISNULL(OrderIsPaid, 0) = 1) WHERE (CurrencyEnabled = 1 OR CurrencyID IN (SELECT OrderCurrencyID FROM COM_Order WHERE OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID)) AND ((@globalCurrency = 1 AND CurrencySiteID IS NULL) OR (@globalCurrency = 0 AND CurrencySiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID))) SELECT CurrencyCode AS '{$unigrid.currency.columns.currencycode$}', CurrencyDisplayName AS '{$unigrid.currency.columns.currencydisplayname$}', CAST(ISNULL(ROUND(SUM(OrderGrandTotal),1),0) AS decimal(38,1)) AS '{$com.sales.volumeofsales$}', CAST(ISNULL(ROUND(SUM(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency),1),0) AS DECIMAL(38,1)) AS '{$com.sales.volumeofsalesinmaincurrency$}', CAST((CASE WHEN @totalsum != 0 THEN CAST(ROUND(ISNULL(SUM(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency),0),1)/@totalsum*100 AS DECIMAL(38,1)) ELSE 0 END) AS VARCHAR(20))+' %' AS '{$reports_pageviews.percent_header$}' FROM COM_Currency LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON CurrencyID = OrderCurrencyID AND (OrderDate >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (OrderDate <= DATEADD(day,1,@ToDate) OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND (ISNULL(@OnlyPaid,0) = 0 OR ISNULL(OrderIsPaid, 0) = 1) WHERE (CurrencyEnabled = 1 OR CurrencyID IN (SELECT OrderCurrencyID FROM COM_Order WHERE OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID)) AND ((@globalCurrency = 1 AND CurrencySiteID IS NULL)OR(@globalCurrency = 0 AND CurrencySiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID)) GROUP BY CurrencyDisplayName, CurrencyCode ORDER BY SUM(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency) DESC, CurrencyCode, CurrencyDisplayName
